formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetGroup' =-
[Synopsis] Set the channel's group
[Description] Usage: SetGroup(groupname[@category]) Sets the channel group to the specified value. Equivalent to Set(GROUP=group). Always returns 0.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
